summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBlume Meltdown Daily Balancing Gel Cleanser is a refreshingly gentle gel cleanser that cleans thoroughly and is made with green tea, salicylic acid, and ceramides to leave skin feeling balanced and purified.
details: DetailsBenefitsCalming, soothingDoesn’t dry out, irritate skin, or clog poresBuilds up skin’s natural barrierBalances skin’s pHRemoves makeupCleans deep downKey IngredientsSalicylic AcidCeramidesGreen Tea Leaf ExtractFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFormaldehydesItem 2647955How To Use-Dispense a generous amount of cleanser.Lather and Melt:-With clean hands, apply to face and neck, massaging with warm water until it lightly lathers.Repeat:-Optional, but a double cleanse is always best if you're melting away makeup.Rinse:-Thoroughly rinse off with water.IngredientsAqua, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin Sodium Myristoyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Lauryl Lactate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Propanediol, Saccharomyces Ferment Lysate Filtrate, Salicylic Acid, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Oil, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Oil, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Blue 1, Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil.
how_to_use: -Dispense a generous amount of cleanser.Lather and Melt:-With clean hands, apply to face and neck, massaging with warm water until it lightly lathers.Repeat:-Optional, but a double cleanse is always best if you're melting away makeup.Rinse:-Thoroughly rinse off with water.
